snippet.title: Johnny Depp Reportedly Wrote ‘I Love You’ In His Own Blood During Alleged Assault On Amber Heard
snippet.description: Actor Johnny  reportedly wrote words around a house in his own blood during a fight with ex-wife Amber Heard, per .   claimed the argument had occurred in 2015 after  asked Heard to sign a post-nuptial agreement and she refused, according to a report published Thursday by the . The new details on the fight have come to light on day three of ’s testimony in his libel lawsuit against The Sun.     The Sun’s lawyers, Sasha Wass, claimed the fight wasn’t over the post-nuptial agreement, and  had agreed it might be “possible” he had accused Heard of cheating on him with Billy Bob Thornton.  Wass claimed  smashed “smashed bottle after bottle.” Meanwhile,  accused Heard of throwing a vodka bottle at him and severing his finger.  “Look what you made me do!”  reportedly said at the time as he finished writing the phrase “I Love You” on a mirror.    denied the claims that he attacked Heard that day.  “I vehemently deny it, and would go so far as to say it is pedestrian fiction,” he reportedly said in court.  The house was left with allegedly $75,000 worth of damage.   has  The Sun over an article published in 2018 calling the actor a “wife-beater.”  claimed Heard was the violent one.
